00007 #import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
00008 #import "CPTDefinitions.h"
00009 
00013 typedef struct _CPTGradientElement {
00014     CPTRGBAColor color; 
00015     CGFloat position;   
00016     
00017     struct _CPTGradientElement *nextElement;    
00018 } CPTGradientElement;
00019 
00023 typedef enum _CPTBlendingMode {
00024     CPTLinearBlendingMode,          
00025     CPTChromaticBlendingMode,       
00026     CPTInverseChromaticBlendingMode 
00027 } CPTGradientBlendingMode;
00028 
00032 typedef enum _CPTGradientType {
00033     CPTGradientTypeAxial,   
00034     CPTGradientTypeRadial   
00035 } CPTGradientType;

00037 @class CPTColorSpace;

00040 @interface CPTGradient : NSObject <NSCopying, NSCoding> {
00041 @private
00042     CPTColorSpace *colorspace;
00043     CPTGradientElement *elementList;
00044     CPTGradientBlendingMode blendingMode;
00045     CGFunctionRef gradientFunction;
00046     CGFloat angle;  // angle in degrees
00047     CPTGradientType gradientType;
00048 }
00049

00051 @property (nonatomic, readwrite, assign) CGFloat angle;
00052 @property (nonatomic, readwrite, assign) CPTGradientType gradientType;
